solution_line_template: The second protest was {first_protest_days}*{percent_longer}=<<{first_protest_days}*{percent_longer}={extra_days}>>{extra_days} day longer than the first.
So the second protest was {first_protest_days}+{extra_days}=<<{first_protest_days}+{extra_days}={second_protest_days}>>{second_protest_days} days.
